message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, and you get 40.
I understand you want to start fair, but the value decreases for me each round.  Let's be equitable.
Okay, let's compromise.  I'll take 55, and you can have 45.  We both get something closer to what we want.
This is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer before inflation eats away at the value even more and we both lose out.
